require_cmd "${TM_HG:=hg}" "If you have installed hg, then you need to either update your <tt>PATH</tt> or set the <tt>TM_HG</tt> shell variable (e.g. in Preferences / Advanced)"
if [[ -d "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" ]] then export WorkPath="$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" else export WorkPath="$TM_DIRECTORY" fi
# show it.. "$TM_HG" status "$WorkPath" 2>&1 \ |"${TM_RUBY:-ruby}" -- "${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/format_status.rb" "--status"
